means: 元音省略，脱水收缩（作用）

word_mean: 〔胶体〕凝缩〔作用〕：凝胶分散相颗粒集合，分出部分分散介质，同时凝胶收缩，犹如发生在血液凝固时

sentence.Network_en: Characteristic defects are of two main types; regression and syneresis.
sentence.Network_cn: 特征缺陷主要有两类: 即退化和脱水收缩.

sentence.Network_en: The results showed that the product had high viscosity, constant viscosity, water - absorption capacity and good anti - syneresis.
sentence.Network_cn: 该法制得的交联羧甲基淀粉,其粘度 、 粘度稳定性 、 吸水性及抗压保水性能很好.

sentence.Network_en: The salinity has no effect on the syneresis of xanthan - chromium ( III ) gel system.
sentence.Network_cn: 凝胶的脱水行为基本上不受矿化度的影响.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: via late Latin from Greek sunairesis, based on sun- 'together' + hairein 'take'

means.word_mean: 1. the contraction of two vowels into a diphthong
2. the separation of liquid from a gel that is caused by contraction (as in cheese making)
